span.span: The source of the event, the .
An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理 控件的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件来显示信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to display information. 您可能会处理是非常消耗 （大量的时间或资源） 为您的网页执行的每个数据操作创建的业务对象。You might work with a business object that is very expensive (in terms of time or resources) to create for every data operation that your Web page performs. 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的一个实例并缓存而不是创建和销毁它为每个数据操作的后续操作。One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation. 此示例演示了此模式。This example demonstrates this pattern. 您可以处理事件对象，首先检查缓存，然后创建一个实例，仅当尚未缓存。You can handle the event to check the cache first for an object, and then create an instance, only if one is not already cached. 然后，处理事件来缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。Then, handle the event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it. 在此示例中，的属性类设置为`true`，以指示不要调用实例上。In this example, the property of the class is set to `true`, to direct the to not call on the instance. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/objds16cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/objds16vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 通过定义的基本业务对象的代码示例包含`EmployeeLogic`类，该类是维护状态，并封装业务逻辑的类。The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that maintains state and encapsulates business logic. 有关完整的工作示例，您必须编译为一个库，此代码，然后使用这些类从 ASP 页。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/CS/northwindemployee16.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_16/VB/northwindemployee16.vb#2)]
